text: Yi kuraharu adrsyama bha'eka samacaraharumadhyeka hun, jasala'i hamile timro che'uma vahya (kura'anaka ayata)ko madhyamabata patha'umchau ra timi uniharubica thi'enau jaba tiniharule aphna kalamaharu halirakheka thi'e ki mariyamala'i kasale palnecha? Ra tyasa bela pani tiniharubica thi'enau, jabaki tiniharu apasama jhagada garirakheka thi'e
